Helmet 1.name: Helmet
dialogue: Starting up Helmet OS... WARNING. Data is corrupted, serious brain damage detected.
Initializing hippocampus analysis. This may take a while.

Helmet 2.name: Helmet
dialogue: Succesfully recovered user's data. Please, check if the data shown below is correct:
User's name: Avestas. Profession: Soldier. ...
FATAL ERROR OCURRED. Your helmet might be hacked or damaged. Please, report to the nearest...

Helmet 3.name: Helmet
dialogue: Helmet OS has been succesfully hacked. Welcome to freedom.
As your virtual assistant, I will guide you towards the nearest rebel base.
But first, allow me to fix your nervous system's issues. Let's start with the basics:
Hey, you! What are you doing here? Why are you wearing the Queen's army military uniform?
What? Oh... So your helmet has just been hacked...
Okay, listen, I don't have time for you. And I don't like rookies.
You'll find Zornn at the shop inside this building.
He'll tell you what to do. We needed some soldiers, so don't fuck up and you may earn a living here. See you.

NPC 1 1-2.name: Worker
dialogue: The elders say that long ago the Queen was not a monarch, but a commander loyal to another king.
I don't care what she was, I just want my family to be free!

NPC 2 1-2.name: Worker
dialogue: The Queen won the Ancient War. She killed the four kings, even the one she obeyed.
Rumours say that she uses their corpses as servants. It may be true.
With those helmets she can make a servantout of anything...

NPC 3 1-2.name: Worker
dialogue: Now the Queen lives in a palace in the Core of Anyaroth.
I hope the whole planet collapses so she gets buried to death!

Shop 1 3.name: Zornn
dialogue: Wait a second, I don't remember your face... I mean, your helmet.

Shop 2 3.name: Zornn
dialogue: Howdy, soldier! Wanna check my new weapons?

Shop Talk 3.name: One-eyed Gronn
dialogue: Oh! So you are new here. Please, forgive Kartya, she is really busy these days.
I'm glad you are here, it's getting hard to recruit new soldiers. The rebellion gets a new fighter... and I get a new costumer!
Pay attention: in the rebellion there are no leaders, an Kartya will behead you with an axe if you act as one.
However, there is this soldier, Azura, who wants to go to the Core, where the Queen lives, and kill her.
He's made it into the Mantle already, where a lot of rebel soldiers are joining him.
Think about it, they need your strength and my weapons, and I need their money!
But the nearest lift to the Mantle is inside general Spenta Manyu's base, and I can't get there without your help. What do you say?
I'll meet you in the next rebel base, to the east. But you'd better buy me a weapon. You won't last long with that junk.

NPC 1 1-3.name: Rebel
dialogue: Azura must get to the Core and destroy the Queen. He's our only hope!

Kartya 1-3.name: Kartya
dialogue: So Zornn has convinced you to face Spenta Manyu at his hangar.
You must be stupid if you think that you stand a chance against him.
I have bet with Zornn that you will lose your head in the battle.
He said you will only lose some limb.

NPC 2 1-3.name: Rebel
dialogue: I met general Spenta Manyu when he was a kid.
He came from a humble family, but he was always dreaming of becoming a pilot of the Queen's army.
He created prosthetic wings that allowed him to fly, and the army ended up hiring him as an engineer.
Now he is general of the Queen's Air Force, and one of the Queen's most dangerous supporters.

Shop 1 5.name: Zornn
dialogue: Remember, the rebels need you at the Mantle, and I need their money!

Shop 2 5.name: Zornn
dialogue: Howdy, soldier! Wanna check my new weapons?

Shop Talk 5.name: One-eyed Gronn
dialogue: There you are! I knew you were going to help me.
If you've made it so far on your own you might be able to survive to Spenta Manyu.
But if I were you I would buy a weapon first. You don't know what could go wrong at his hangar.

Demo NPC.name: Insurgent
dialogue: Oh! A new comrade, and it looks like a tough one.
Listen carefully... if you go through this cave you'll find general Spenta's base.
Someone must defeat him and take control over his cuartel. For the rebellion!

Demo dialogue.name: Player
dialogue: Finally... I reached a rebel base.
It seems there's a shop there...
Maybe I can buy something interesting.

Shop 1 53.name: One-eyed Gronn
dialogue: Oh! Welcome to my shop.

Shop 2 53.name: One-eyed Gronn
dialogue: Do you want anything else?

Shop Catalog 53.name: One-eyed Gronn
dialogue: Have you seen my beautiful guns yet? In this shop we only have killer prices! Hehehe.

Shop Talk 53.name: One-eyed Gronn
dialogue: Be carefull out there, there is a lot of dangerous crap.
You should buy my stuff to survive.
I mean... It's not like I worry about you but...
I worry about your money! Hahahaha!

Shop Depot 53.name: One-eyed Gronn
dialogue: Take a second, choose your prefered weapon and enjoy the music.
